text: jo shakhs ijzat ka khvaahaan ho to khuda se maange kyonki saaree ijzat khuda hee kee hai usakee baaragaah tak achchhee baaten (buland hokar) pahunchateen hain aur achchhe kaam ko vah khud buland pharamaata hai aur jo log (tumhaare khilaaph) buree-buree tadabeeren karate rahate hain unake lie qayaamat mein sakht azaab hai aur (aakhir) un logon kee tadabeer matiyaamet ho jaegee
